dcterms:description: The NLP4IF shared task dataset consists of 350 articles, with a total of 16,965 sentences, where 4,720 are labeled as propaganda and 12,245 are labeled as non-propaganda. The dataset is used for training models to detect propaganda in text.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF shared task dataset
